name: Wednesday (sammy)
description:
This was made WHILE I was going through the things depicted in it, and released literally the Wednesday after I found out there were other days of the week. It is going to be a little raw! But I hope you enjoy it anyway.

You're more than welcome to download it for free (which includes the soundtrack, in the data folder), but if you pay $3 or more for it you get the cute little art book I made to accompany it just to say thank you for financially supporting my work.
